fields.name: AccountKey
fields.description: The account key (shared key) to access the storage account

fields.name: ContainerName
fields.description: The Azure Blob container name to sync from the url endpoint for the flux configuration.

fields.name: LocalAuthRef
fields.description: Name of a local secret on the Kubernetes cluster to use as the authentication secret rather than the managed or user-provided configuration secrets.

fields.name: ManagedIdentity
fields.description: Parameters to authenticate using a Managed Identity.

fields.name: SasToken
fields.description: The Shared Access token to access the storage container

fields.name: ServicePrincipal
fields.description: Parameters to authenticate using Service Principal.

fields.name: SyncIntervalInSeconds
fields.description: The interval at which to re-reconcile the cluster Azure Blob source with the remote.

fields.name: TimeoutInSeconds
fields.description: The maximum time to attempt to reconcile the cluster Azure Blob source with the remote.

fields.name: Url
fields.description: The URL to sync for the flux configuration Azure Blob storage account.
